sk1.name: Thunder Clap
sk1.desc: Slams the ground, dealing damage and slowing the movement speed and attack rate of nearby enemy land units.

sk2.name: Drunken Haze
sk2.desc: Drenches a small area in alcohol, causing their movement speed to be reduced, and causing their attacks to have a chance to miss.

sk3.name: Drunken Brawler
sk3.desc: Gives a chance to avoid attacks and to deal critical damage. Drunken Brawler will always activate if you have not attacked, or have not been attacked, in the last %last_proc% seconds.

sk4.name: Primal Split
sk4.desc: Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
